ADC_PAGE_STATE Body

Implementation of the ADC_PAGE_STATE logic

Author

Juergen Sieben, ConDeS GmbH

Types
session_value_rec
Properties
string_value

Actual value of the item as VARCHAR2

date_value

Actual value of the item as DATE, if possible

number_value

Actual value of the item as NUMBER, if possible

Private methods
harmonize_page_item_name
function harmonize_page_item_name(
p_cpi_id in adc_page_items.cpi_id%type
)
return varchar2

Method to assure that a page item has got a page prefix

Parameter
p_cpi_id
in adc_page_items.cpi_id%type

Name of the page item to harmonize

Returns: Page item name with page prefix

get_mandatory_default_value
function get_mandatory_default_value(
p_crg_id in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type,
p_cpi_id in adc_page_items.cpi_id%type
)
return varchar2

Method to retrieve a default value for a mandatory page item.

Is used to retrieve the default value if a mandatory item is NULL and  a default value was defined.

Parameters
p_crg_id
in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type

ID of the rule group. Required to retrieve format mask and default value

p_cpi_id
in adc_page_items.cpi_id%type

ID of the page item

Returns

Default value for that page item.

get_mandatory_message
function get_mandatory_message(
p_crg_id in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type,
p_cpi_id in adc_page_items.cpi_id%type
)
return varchar2

Returns a default mandatory message for a page item.

If a mandatory item is NULL, a message has to be generated which may have been excplicitly given or not.  This method creates this message and returns a standard message if no explicit message is available.

Parameter
p_cpi_id
in adc_page_items.cpi_id%type

ID of the mandatory page item

Returns

Error message for missing value
